cause.description:
It will be an undergrounds empire completly sheilded from the elements(tornadoes, floods and such) it will house approximatly 60 000 people on a strict first come first serve basis and oo ya NO DANNY SAUVE's allowed fuck you danny. :P
1. Everyone will be healthy and alive
2. Construction should start immediatly
3. Metropolis can withstand all natural disasters
cause.mission: To build an underground city to escape the next ice age
cause.name: CYBERTRON
